member.name: DEDUP_CONTAINER_EXTENT
member.summary: A logical container file may be stored in a single segment or multiple segments in the backup store.DEDUP_CONTAINER_EXTENT represents a single extent of a specific container file as stored in the backup store. The extent may be the full container file or a portion of the file.

member.name: DEDUP_CONTAINER_EXTENT.ContainerIndex
member.summary: The index in the container list passed toIDedupReadFileCallback.OrderContainersRestoreto which this container extent structure corresponds.

member.name: DEDUP_CONTAINER_EXTENT.StartOffset
member.summary: Offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the container to the beginning of the extent.

member.name: DEDUP_CONTAINER_EXTENT.Length
member.summary: Length, in bytes, of the extent.
